name: Shocking Center
description:
Story

There is a super sale at the shopping center and you really want to get a one of these heavily discounted items. But the problem is that other people also want them - so youhave to fight your way through hordes of other shoppers.

Mechanics
  • Roguelike Gameplay
    • Move your character through the individual stores and take the multiple challenges of the game.
  • Time Challenges
    • Timelimits for specific stages will make runs more difficult. If specific stages can be completed below a timelimit the player will be rewarded for it.
  • Player Selection
    • Select and customize your player at the start of each run.
  • Crafting weapons
    • Craft and upgrade your weapons during the game, making them work differently. Find new materials and attach it to your player or weapon.
  • Randomized Stages
    • Each run will feature different stores, gadgets and enemies. No run will be like the one before!
  • Permadeath
    • You only got one chance (do not miss your chance to blow)! - The game has permadeath. When you die there is no turning back. New runs, new decisions.
Characters

The game features a wide variety of pixelart characters as well as selectable and customizable player characters at the start of each run.
